pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data Exchange Between R and 'LabKey' Server // The 'LabKey' client library for R makes it easy for R users to load live data from a 'LabKey' Server, https://www.labkey.com/, into the R environment for analysis, provided users have permissions to read the data. It also enables R users to insert, update, and delete records stored on a 'LabKey' Server, provided they have appropriate permissions to do so.
